platform_description.title: Rosokh: Islamic Multimedia Platform
platform_description.description: Rosokh is an innovative Islamic platform delivering a comprehensive digital experience for Quran recitation, audio, video, and interactive games. Designed to be ultra-fast, completely free, and trilingual (Arabic, English, Russian), it features a Hijri calendar, Khatma tracking, and an analytics dashboard. Built with a modern, green-tosca geometric design and zero heavy dependencies, Rosokh ensures high performance and accessibility across all devices.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How do I track my Quran reading progress?
faq.a1: Use the Khatma feature to set reading goals and track your progress. You can log your daily reading sessions and view detailed analytics.
faq.q2: Can I use the app offline?
faq.a2: Yes, the Quran text is available offline. However, features like prayer times and audio require an internet connection.
faq.q3: How accurate are the prayer times?
faq.a3: Prayer times are calculated based on your location and are generally accurate within a few minutes. You can adjust them in settings if needed.
faq.q4: Is the app available in multiple languages?
faq.a4: Yes, Rosokh supports Arabic, English, and Russian languages. You can switch languages in the settings.
faq.q5: How do I report a bug or suggest a feature?
faq.a5: You can use this contact form to report bugs or suggest features. We appreciate all feedback from our community.
